price: Tí ẹ kò bá sì ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, ẹ kò wulẹ̀ lè ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀, nítorí náà, ẹ ṣọ́ra fún Iná, èyí tí ìkoná rẹ̀ jẹ́ àwọn ènìyàn àti òkúta tí wọ́n pa lésè sílẹ̀ de àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́.
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَفۡعَلُواْ وَلَن تَفۡعَلُواْ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِي وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡحِجَارَةُۖ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-in lam tafʿalū walan tafʿalū fa-ittaqū al-nāra allatī waqūduhā al-nāsu wal-ḥijāratu uʿiddat lil'kāfirīna
